/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

On the right side of the road, there's a large truck covered in a green tarp. It's parked, perhaps waiting for its turn to move. On the left side of the road, a red car is in motion, adding a splash of color to the scene.

The road itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a natural border to the highway. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sides of the road, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and urban development.
